---
title: "`r params$page_title`"
output: html_document
params:
  df: df
  colspec: colspec
  page_title: page_title
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(comment = NA)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(rownames.print = FALSE)
```

```{css, echo=FALSE}
h1.title {
	font-size: 28px;
	}
p.compact {
	margin-bottom: 0px;
	margin-top: 0px;
	}
```

```{r}
prepare_table(
  params$df,
  params$colspec$timepoint_col,
  params$colspec$item_col,
  params$colspec$value_col,
  history_type = "value"
  ) %>%
  output_table_html(
    item_label = "item",
    history_style = "bar"
  )
```
